---
title: Submit Signed Transaction for Broadcast
---

After signing the transaction, you will `PUT /api/v1/flows/[:flow_id]/next` (as always!) and the Staking API will manage broadcasting the transaction to the network.

### Parameters

- `name` - `string` Name of the action to execute (required).
- `inputs` - `array`
  - `transaction_payload` - Signed transaction payload from the previous step's response.

#### Sample cURL Request

```json
curl -X PUT 'https://near-slate.datahub.figment.io/api/v1/flows/5f0962d5-fba0-453c-bf35-0dad79624b59/next' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--header 'Authorization: <api_key>' \
--data '{
  // highlight-start
  "name": "sign_transfer_tx",
  "inputs": {
    "transaction_payload": ""
  }
  // highlight-end
}'
```

### Response

With the signed transaction provided, Staking API will broadcast it to the network. As the transaction progresses towards confirmation, the returned state will be one of:

- `transfer_tx_broadcasting` — Transaction has been broadcast and is waiting confirmation.
- `transfered` — Transaction has been confirmed and the transfer is complete.

#### Sample Response

```json
{
  "id": "5f0962d5-fba0-453c-bf35-0dad79624b59",
  // highlight-next-line
  "state": "transfer_tx_broadcasting",
  "actions": [
    {
      "name": "wait",
      "estimated_state_change_at": "2022-09-26T16:50:38.484Z",
      "inputs": []
    }
  ],
  "data": {
    "from_account_pubkey": "ed25519:5QA46X6NkNmsFdu9xWVBaLNowh9gGeF1c5r9u6NcxaLY",
    "from_account_address": "slate-demo.testnet",
    "to_account_address": "pizza.testnet",
    "amount": "10.0",
    "transfer_transaction": {
      "raw": "12000000736c6174652d64656d6f2e746573746e657400415d57cdf21d28e35e0cfa864e895c18b4bc6a711642d38eb6762af81ec1cf3906cc1038fc5700000d00000070697a7a612e746573746e657490121aa419ea5a902edec74ac78626fd251b8466f4c637f3ded5f0898014448001000000030000004a480114169545080000000000",
      "signing_payload": "a7ee9bc8e05b776636571edcf4f8b6e679bb53568e384f905f3e4f682eaebcfc",
      "signed": "",
      "hash": "CJY7WBZVnMFWfRteZgHAkf1SgfwnqRvm7K8SsMTiQUSX",
      "status": null,
      "error": null,
      "signatures": []
    }
  },
  "network_code": "near",
  "chain_code": "testnet",
  "created_at": "2022-09-26T16:33:20.109Z",
  "updated_at": "2022-09-26T16:49:37.923Z"
}
```
